eshop_id.title: Eshop ID
eshop_id.description: ID of the eshop for which you want to download report.

date_from.title: Date From
date_from.description: Start date of the report. Either date in YYYY-MM-DD format or dateparser string i.e. 5 days ago, 1 month ago, yesterday, etc.

date_to.title: Date to
date_to.description: End date of the report. Either date in YYYY-MM-DD format or dateparser string i.e. 5 days ago, 1 month ago, yesterday, etc.

table_name.title: Table name (optional)
table_name.description: The name of the output table; if empty, it defaults to the shop id.

incremental_load.title: Load Mode
incremental_load.description: If Full load is used, the destination table will be overwritten every run. If incremental load is used, data will be upserted into the destination table.
